entry.title: @cic_film: #ColoniesInConflict - First film in India about Apis dorsata a honeybee species we see around our neighbourhood but know so little about. In the film we tried to follow the trajectory of the Rockbees and witness a possible decline in their population.
entry.summary: #ColoniesInConflict - First film in India about Apis dorsata a honeybee species we see around our neighbourhood but know so little about. entry.title: @NCBS_Bangalore: Many studies suggest that the developmental hormone ‘ecdysone’ plays a role in #foraging and #memory processes. But so far no one has found that hormone in the brain of a honey bee forager. @Deepikaabais is trying to detect #ecdysone in the brain using mass spectrometry.
entry.summary: Many studies suggest that the developmental hormone ‘ecdysone’ plays a role in #foraging and #memory processes. But so far no one has found that hormone in the brain of a honey bee forager. @Deepikaabais is trying to detect #ecdysone in the brain using mass spectrometry. pic.twitter.com/U5Y7pGcoJH — National Centre for Biological Sciences (@NCBS_Bangalore) May 6, 2022

entry.title: @VarunVenkatara2: Very happy that our latest Perspective is now online @NatureRevCancer ! entry.title: @NatureRevCancer: NEW #ResearchHighlight! Lv, Liu, Mo & co demonstrate that in pancreatic #PDAC cells, gasdermin E transports YBX1 to the nucleus, which promotes mucin expression, thereby providing tumour cells with a barrier against digestive enzymes.📯
